item.title: 1Panel安装教程
item.description:
# 1Panel官网 [1Panel.cn](url)
首先安装docker CentOS 安装脚本 `curl -sSL https://resource.fit2cloud.com/1panel/package/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && sh quick_start.sh` Ubuntu 安装脚本 `curl -sSL https://resource.fit2cloud.com/1panel/package/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && sudo bash quick_start.sh` Debian 安装脚本 `curl -sSL https://resource.fit2cloud.com/1panel/package/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && bash quick_start.sh` openEuler 安装脚本 `bash <(curl -sSL https://linuxmirrors.cn/docker.sh)` `curl -sSL https://resource.fit2cloud.com/1panel/package/quick_start.sh -o quick_start.sh && sh quick_start.sh`。
